ANML

Ernie Ball

Ernie Ball is the industry’s most recognized name in Rock ’N Roll strings. Working with legends such as Paul McCartney and Eric Clapton, the company has spent the last 50 years redefining how people play music. ANML created a web experience that communicates Ernie Ball’s commitment to artistry, innovation, and music culture. With a bold new design system, ANML helped Ernie Ball bridge the gap between their iconic legacy and the next generation of rockstars.

Visual DesignUX

Placing artists
in the spotlight

Ernie Ball artists are legends, trendsetters, and innovators that have altered the course of music history. We created an immersive hub where users could learn about their favorite artists, discover new ones, and find products based on their most important criteria: how they want to sound.

Elevating the
buying experience

We redefined the way that users interact with the Ernie Ball brand by creating a clear path to discover, compare, and purchase products. We focused on distinguishing between product lines, visualizing their sound, and highlighting the engineering that makes Ernie Ball products the best in the industry.

celebrating a legacy of
creativity and innovation

Ernie Ball’s story is a collection of triumphs, innovations, and game-changing decisions that have defined the music industry. To communicate the company’s rich history, we designed an interactive timeline that gives users a closer look at the moments that led to a Rock ‘N Roll revolution.

"The ANML team has incredible attention to detail that’s hard to find anywhere else. Their fresh approach and pixel perfect design helped shape Ernie Ball’s digital rebrand, keeping the rock’n roll attitude while providing users with a clean, thought-out experience.”
Dustin HinzEVP Marketing | Ernie Ball

Transporting Anthony Bourdain fans into the world of Parts Unknown

Bell Helmets

eBay Enterprise and ANML helped reposition Bell’s brand and inspired a new generation of athletes.

Netapp

ANML enabled NetApp to shatter corporate site stereotypes. And did it in record time.

Autodesk

Insights into the gaming world allowed ANML to revolutionize Autodesk’s software UI.

ServiceNow

ANML helped ServiceNow’s site live up to their promise of “changing how people work.”

Santana Row

Santana Row needed ANML to deliver an online experience worthy of it’s real world one.

Roads & Kingdoms

ANML helped R&K redefine online travel journalism—and win an award in the process.

Citrix

ANML worked with Citrix to design an immersive blog experience that would shine on every device.
